level_1.skillDescription:
Attack up to 3 times from range using engram bullets
Alternate to a knockback attack by pressing a sideways directional key during the 3rd attack

level_2.skillDescription: Alternate to an attack that applies Speed Down by pressing the forward directional key during the 3rd attack

level_3.skillDescription: Apply a Quick Charge self buff by pressing the backwards directional key during the 3rd attack
